channel.title: Half-Life 3 Being Actively Developed?
channel.description:
Cautious Hooray: Half-Life 3 is being actively developed? Let the rumors start, yet again.
[url='https://www.neogaf.com/forum/showthread.php?t=688711']https://www.neogaf.com/forum/showthread.php?t=688711[/url]
and
[url='https://www.rockpapershotgun.com/2013/10/02/cautious-hooray-half-life-3-being-actively-developed/']https://www.rockpapershotgun.com/2013/10/02/cautious-hooray-half-life-3-being-actively-developed/[/url]
and Valve registers European trademark for Half-Life 3
[url='https://arstechnica.com/gaming/2013/10/valve-registers-european-trademark-for-half-life-3/']https://arstechnica.com/gaming/2013/10/valve-registers-european-trademark-for-half-life-3/[/url]
